snippet: Although Texas lawmakers must file financial disclosures, the information is both insufficient and harder to access than it should be.
lead_paragraph: Although Texas lawmakers must file financial disclosures, the information is both insufficient and harder to access than it should be.

headline.seo: In Texas, More Disclosure From Lawmakers Needed
headline.main: Value of Transparency Is Still Not Clear to All
headline.print_headline: Value of Transparency Is Still Not Clear to All
